name: Project Jack
description:
Play as a wicked Jack-In-The-Box on a journey to save the kingdom from corrupt and oppressive rulers... just so it can be you terrorizing it like in the good old times.

Key Features:
  • Platformer without a jumping mechanic;
  • Colorful world and characters filled with personality;
  • Challenging gameplay;
Controls: 

Move: A/D (Left/Right)

Dodge: S

Attack: Left Mouse-Button

Team: 

Diogo Guerreiro - Game Designer/ Game Developer

Ana Monteiro - Artist
